original_text: I left here with everything that I needed. Now the Lord has brought me back here with nothing. The Almighty Lord has turned against me, so that I have suffered. It is not right for you to call me Naomi.’
korean_text: 내가 풍족하게 나갔더니 여호와께서 내게 비어 돌아오게 하셨느니라 여호와께서 나를 징벌하셨고 전능자가 나를 괴롭게 하셨거늘 너희가 어찌 나를 나오미라 부르느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: I left here with everything that I needed.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 필요한 모든 것을 가지고 이곳을 떠났습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now the Lord has brought me back here
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 주님께서 나를 다시 이곳으로 데려오셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Almighty Lord has turned against me,
It is not right for you to call me Naomi.'
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 나오미라고 부르는 것이 옳지 않습니다.'
